rationale: No intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifies a risk-adjective from the specified list.
The segment contains explicit low-risk framing ('will not enter the food system'), which is not a Q2 Alarmist cue.
The segment states birds 'will not enter the food system' and discusses surveillance programs, which are Food Safety/Preparedness/Confidence cues (Q5), not Q3.
The segment contains a bare negation ('will not enter the food system') and a boast about capability, neither of which are explicit calming cues.
The segment does not contain a minimiser combined with a scale contrast.
